item.title: RT by @JLabmusic: As with many others, Bill Laswell is in dire straights due to health and pandemic. https://www.gofundme.com/f/emergency-please-help-bill-laswell?utm_campaign=p_lico+share-sheet&utm_medium=copy_link&utm_source=customer

item.title: R to @rockonteurs: Brilliant interview with a brilliant producer/engineer. We need a part 2.
item.dc:creator: @JLabmusic
item.description: Brilliant interview with a brilliant producer/engineer. We need a part 2.

item.title: R.I.P. Dave Smith, designer of some of the most iconic synths of all time and one of the developers of MIDI. Lovely fella who'll be much missed.
item.dc:creator: @JLabmusic
item.description: R.I.P. Dave Smith, designer of some of the most iconic synths of all time and one of the developers of MIDI. Lovely fella who'll be much missed.

item.title: Very saddened to hear of the untimely passing of Depeche Mode's Fletch. Met him a couple of times when I worked on DM's shows. A lovely, unassuming fella with a great dry wit. Love and condolences to the band, his family and friends. Go well mate, gone way too soon. #RIPFletch
item.dc:creator: @JLabmusic
item.description: Very saddened to hear of the untimely passing of Depeche Mode's Fletch. Met him a couple of times when I worked on DM's shows. A lovely, unassuming fella with a great dry wit. Love and condolences to the band, his family and friends. Go well mate, gone way too soon. #RIPFletch

item.title: R to @rockonteurs: Never mind the prog! Never in a million years did I think it would be Rick Astley to be the 1st guest of yours to mention the mighty Magma! Great interview, you 2 bring out the best in your guests, long my it continue!
item.dc:creator: @JLabmusic
item.description: Never mind the prog! Never in a million years did I think it would be Rick Astley to be the 1st guest of yours to mention the mighty Magma! Great interview, you 2 bring out the best in your guests, long my it continue!

item.title: R to @Killingjokeband: Stunning work! Loving the 2 new tracks. See you in London. Blessings and salutations for the tour.
item.dc:creator: @JLabmusic
item.description: Stunning work! Loving the 2 new tracks. See you in London. Blessings and salutations for the tour.

item.title: Finishing off some tracks for a new J-Lab EP next week. Spring is coming too, good! It's been a strange few months....
item.dc:creator: @JLabmusic
item.description: Finishing off some tracks for a new J-Lab EP next week. Spring is coming too, good! It's been a strange few months....

item.title: R to @Killingjokeband: Big Paul smashing the groove, Youth's blond Ricky on stand-by - the stars are aligning for a monster! See you in London, and blessings for the rest of the tour. x
item.dc:creator: @JLabmusic
item.description: Big Paul smashing the groove, Youth's blond Ricky on stand-by - the stars are aligning for a monster! See you in London, and blessings for the rest of the tour. x
